TopicTitle: Anyone have the link of the Harvs's DevHR conference in Mexico City?

Articles.Content: I have no problems with Spanish since its my first language and I want to see that video
I think you'll be able to watch it here: http://new.livestream.com/accounts/1597805/events/2472665/videos/32529033
Thanks, its the first video they show online? I really like it.
